00033 // XD travail_pression source_base travail_pression 0 Source term which corresponds to the additional pressure work term that appears when dealing with compressible multiphase fluids

00044 
00045 void Travail_pression_CoviMAC::dimensionner_blocs(matrices_t matrices, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00046 {
00047   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00048   const IntTab& e_f = zone.elem_faces(), &f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00049   const DoubleTab& inco = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
00050   int i, j, e, eb, ne = zone.nb_elem(), f,n, N = inco.line_size(), m, M = ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()).eq_qdm.pression().valeurs().line_size();
00051 
00052   for (auto &&n_m : matrices) if (n_m.first == "pression" || (n_m.first == "alpha" && !semi_impl.count("alpha")) || n_m.first == "vitesse")
00053       {
00054         Matrice_Morse& mat = *n_m.second, mat2;
00055         IntTrav sten(0, 2);
00056         sten.set_smart_resize(1);
00057         if (n_m.first == "pression") /* pression : dependance locale, implicite */
00058           for (e = 0; e < ne; e++) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1)) sten.append_line(N * e + n, M * e + m);
00059         else if (n_m.first == "vitesse") for (e = 0; e < ne; e++) for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++)
00060               for (n = 0; n < N; n++) sten.append_line(N * e + n, N * f + n);
00061         else for (e = 0; e < ne; e++) for (i = 0; i < e_f.dimension(1) && (f = e_f(e, i)) >= 0; i++) for (j = 0; j < 2 && (eb = f_e(f, j)) >= 0; j++)
00062                 for (n = 0; n < N; n++) sten.append_line(N * e + n, N * eb + n);
00063         tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(sten);
00064         Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(inco.size_totale(), equation().probleme().get_champ(n_m.first.c_str()).valeurs().size_totale(), sten, mat2);
00065         mat.nb_colonnes() ? mat += mat2 : mat = mat2;
00066       }
00067 }
00068 
00069 void Travail_pression_CoviMAC::ajouter_blocs(matrices_t matrices, DoubleTab& secmem, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00070 {
00071   const Pb_Multiphase& pbm = ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme());
00072   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC, equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00073   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &pf = zone.porosite_face(), &fs = zone.face_surfaces(), &ve = zone.volumes();
00074   const Champ_Inc_base& ch_a = pbm.eq_masse.inconnue().valeur(), &ch_v = pbm.eq_qdm.inconnue().valeur(), &ch_p = pbm.eq_qdm.pression().valeur();
00075   /* trois tableaux de alpha : present / passe et champ convecte (peut etre semi-implicite) */
00076   const DoubleTab& alpha = ch_a.valeurs(), &c_alpha = semi_impl.count("alpha") ? semi_impl.at("alpha") : alpha, &p_alpha = ch_a.passe(), &press = ch_p.valeurs(), &vit = ch_v.valeurs();
00077   const IntTab& fcl = ref_cast(Champ_P0_CoviMAC, ch_a).fcl(), &f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00078   DoubleTab b_alpha = ch_a.valeur_aux_bords();
00079   Matrice_Morse *Mp = matrices.count("pression") ? matrices.at("pression") : NULL,
00080                  *Ma = matrices.count("alpha") && !semi_impl.count("alpha") ? matrices.at("alpha") : NULL,
00081                   *Mv = matrices.count("vitesse") ? matrices.at("vitesse") : NULL;
00082 
00083   int i, j, e, eb, f, n, N = alpha.line_size(), m, M = press.line_size();
00084   const Op_Conv_EF_Stab_CoviMAC_Elem *op_conv = sub_type(Op_Conv_EF_Stab_CoviMAC_Elem, equation().operateur(1).l_op_base()) ? &ref_cast(Op_Conv_EF_Stab_CoviMAC_Elem, equation().operateur(1).l_op_base()) : NULL;
00085   double dt = equation().schema_temps().pas_de_temps(), alp = op_conv ? op_conv->alpha : 1; /* meme decentrement que l'operateur de convection si il existe, amont sinon */
00086 
00087 // partie -p d alpha_k / dt et ses derivees
00088   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem(); e++)
00089     {
00090       for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1)) secmem(e, n) -= pe(e) * ve(e) * press(e, m) * (alpha(e, n) - p_alpha(e, n)) / dt;
00091       if (Mp) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1)) (*Mp)(N * e + n, M * e + m) += pe(e) * ve(e) * (alpha(e, n) - p_alpha(e, n)) / dt;
00092       if (Ma) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1)) (*Ma)(N * e + n, N * e + n) += pe(e) * ve(e) * press(e, m) / dt;
00093     }
00094 
00095 // partie -p div (alpha_k v_k)
00096   DoubleTrav dv_flux(N), dc_flux(2, N); //derivees du flux convectif a la face par rapport a la vitesse / au champ convecte amont / aval
00097   /* convection aux faces internes (fcl(f, 0) == 0), de Neumann_val_ext ou de Dirichlet */
00098   for (f = 0; f < zone.nb_faces(); f++) if (!fcl(f, 0) || (fcl(f, 0) > 4 && fcl(f, 0) < 7))
00099       {
00100         for (dv_flux = 0, dc_flux = 0, i = 0; i < 2; i++) for (e = f_e(f, i), n = 0; n < N; n++)
00101             {
00102               double v = vit(f, n) ? vit(f, n) : DBL_MIN, fac = pf(f) * fs(f) * (1. + (v * (i ? -1 : 1) > 0 ? 1. : -1) * alp) / 2;
00103               dv_flux(n) += fac * (e >= 0 ? c_alpha(e, n) : b_alpha(f, n)); //f est reelle -> indice trivial dans b_alpha
00104               dc_flux(i, n) = e >= 0 ? fac * vit(f, n) : 0;
00105             }
00106 
00107 // second membre
00108         for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) if (e < zone.nb_elem()) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1))
00109               secmem(e, n) -= (i ? -1 : 1) * press(e, m) * dv_flux(n) * vit(f, n);
00110 // derivees : vitesse
00111         if (Mv) for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) if (e < zone.nb_elem()) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1))
00112                 (*Mv)(N * e + n, N * f + n) += (i ? -1 : 1) * press(e, m) * dv_flux(n);
00113 // derivees : pression
00114         if (Mp) for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) if (e < zone.nb_elem()) for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1))
00115                 (*Mp)(N * e + n, M * e + m) += (i ? -1 : 1) * dv_flux(n) * vit(f, n);
00116 // derivees : alpha
00117         if (Ma) for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) if (e < zone.nb_elem()) for (j = 0; j < 2 && (eb = f_e(f, j)) >= 0; j++)
00118                 for (n = 0, m = 0; n < N; n++, m += (M > 1)) (*Ma)(N * e + n, N * eb + n) += (i ? -1 : 1) * press(e, m) * dc_flux(j, n);
00119       }
00120 }
